column5: This isn't a sponsor of ours, but I came across this on the internet and thought I would share. Looks like a heck of an idea for guys who like to fish smaller fish and trout. Can be tough to unhook a smaller fish with pliers! http://www.unhookum.com/videos.html
Hmmm...be interesting trying to unhook an angry 20 pound common  or shoal carp...  Think I'll hang on to my hemostats...
Lol...don't think it was made for the shoal carps for sure. But I know I've had trouble releasing some overly aggressive panfish with mangling them with pliers or hemostats.

Nice looking tool I could see that as being handy thanks for the link Rick. I wonder if they would come on board and have a OFC Special buy??? I will wait a few weeks to see if you can arrange it for us.  Art

Almost 18$ ( shipping incl) for this  I've made few like this (little bit different end shape)sometime ago for about  0.25$ ( piece of dovel, two part epoxy, piece of SS wire). Do not have time right now to to find one and post picture, but anybody can make one in about 10 min.
I use a Middy degorger from the UK that works great for my macth fishing and carp fishing. $3. I think this new type would only work well while fly fishing.  Just My 2c
